description:
Think about how much trail muck gets on you, even more gets on your bike. Since your steed doesn’t get to hop in the shower after every ride, treat it to a deep cleaning with Muc-Off’s Punk Powder. With the same cleaning power you expect from Muc-Off’s pink cleaner, this powdered bike wash is fully plastic free and biodegradable. Easy to use, simply rinse your bike, spray on the cleaner and let it sit 3-5 minutes, scrub any heavily soiled areas, and rinse off.

  • Safe on all surfaces, including raw carbon fibre
  • Fast dissolving formula, so less mixing and more riding
  • Each 30g packet mixes up 1L of bike cleaner
  • Powder format saves water and uses 92% less packaging than 4 of Muc-Off’s 1L bottles of cleaner
  • Alkaline based and free from alcohol, CFCs, EDTA, solvents or acids
  • Plastic free formulation
  • Sachets are compostable
  • Packets have a 3 year shelf life, keeping you in cleaner for future seasons
name: Muc-Off Punk Powder (4-pack)
